name: A night in the forest
description:
You trapped in a forest with different types of monsters.  You need to survive as much as you could.

WASD movement

R-reload,  C-throws a electric ball

SPACE-jump

LEFTSHIFT-run

Thanks for playing!

SYSTEN REQUIREMENTS

RECOMMENDED:

2ghz processor

8GB ram

2gb Vram

Free 300 mb space

MINIMUM:

2ghz processor

4gb ram

1gb Vram

Free 300 mb space

DON'T FORGET TO COMMENT AND RATE
